a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Historical Index of Human Development vs. GDP per capita, 2015
Historical Index of Human Development (HIHD), measured from 0 to 1 (where highest is best) versus gross domestic product
(GDP) per capita, measured in 2011 international-$. HIHD is a composite measure of development derived from the variables
average life expectancy, literacy rates, educational enrolment and GDP per capita.
Source: Prados de la Escosura (2018); Maddison Project Database (2018)
